query:
UPDATE task_comments
            SET
                message = $1,
                updated_at = $2
            WHERE id = $3
            RETURNING
                id          AS "id!: Uuid",
                task_id     AS "task_id!: Uuid",
                author_id   AS "author_id!: Uuid",
                message     AS "message!",
                created_at  AS "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                updated_at  AS "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
